Event.Message: The VM and host networking components successfully negotiated protocol version '%2'
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VersionLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Version" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VersionLen"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: The VM and host networking components failed to negotiate protocol version '%2'
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VersionLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Version" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VersionLen"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: The miniport '%2' was successfully initialized
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to initialize miniport '%2', Status = '%3'
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="UniqueEventValue" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to set config parameters on miniport NIC '%2', Status = '%5'
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> <data name="SubkeyNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SubkeyName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="SubkeyNameLen"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: Miniport NIC '%2' is halting
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: Miniport NIC '%2' reset
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: Miniport NIC '%2' hung
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: Miniport NIC '%2' halted
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: Miniport NIC '%2' paused
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: Miniport NIC '%2' restarted
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: Miniport NIC '%2' connected
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: Miniport NIC '%2' disconnected
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: Miniport NIC '%2' network has changed
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: Microport initialization failed, reason = %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>

Event.Message: NBL %2 miniport NIC '%5' is dropped. Reason: %3. Status - %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="Operation" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DropReason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to send packet at the microport. Reason: %2. Status - %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="DropReason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: NBL %4 CorrelationID %5 on IfIndex %6 direction %2 dropped reason %3 status %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="Direction" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DropReason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Pointer" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="CorrelationId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: NBL %2 CorrelationID %3 on IfIndex %4 direction %1 Synthetic
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Direction" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Pointer" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="CorrelationId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: NBL %2 CorrelationID %3 on IfIndex %4 direction %1 VF
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Direction" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Pointer" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="CorrelationId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PD initialization succeeded.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientContext" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message: PD initialization failed.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="ClientContext" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message: PD cleanup succeeded.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientContext" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> </template>

Event.Message: Open NDK adapter failed on Miniport '%4'. FailureReason: %2 Status: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="failureReason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: NDK PnP event failed. PnPEvent: %2 Miniport: '%5' FailureReason: %3 Status: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="NetEvent" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="failureReason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: VF adapter bind failed. FailureReason: %2 MsgStatus: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="failureReason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task, %1, failed because of low memory. %2 bytes of memory was required
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Task" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MemoryRequired" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Sending Interface Index (IfIndex %3)of RNDIS miniport '%5' to VF adapter '%7' succeeded.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="RequestHandled" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> <data name="VfAdapterNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VfAdapterName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VfAdapterNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: Sending Interface Index (IfIndex %3)of RNDIS miniport '%5' to VF adapter '%7' failed. Status = %1. RequestHandled = %2. RDMA cannot be enabled on the adapter
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="RequestHandled" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="IfIndex" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> <data name="VfAdapterNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VfAdapterName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VfAdapterNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: NDK PnP event succeeded. PnPEvent: %2 Miniport: '%5'
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="NetEvent" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="failureReason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: Miniport '%4' reported NDK capabilities. Operation NDK enabled - %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="NdkEnabled" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: Miniport '%4' failed to report NDK capabilities. Operation NDK enabled - %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> <data name="NdkEnabled" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="MiniportNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MiniportName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="MiniportNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: VF adapter '%2' did not report NDK capabilities.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VfAdapterNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VfAdapterName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VfAdapterNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: VF adapter '%2' reported NDK capabilities in enabled operational state.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VfAdapterNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VfAdapterName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VfAdapterNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: VF adapter '%2' reported NDK capabilities in disabled operational state.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="VfAdapterNameLen" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VfAdapterName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" length="VfAdapterNameLen"/> </template>

Event.Message: A VF connection failed due to isolated VM restriction. Status: %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:NTStatus"/> </template>
